translations: en_I want to talk to you.

unitsOfMeaning.content: I want to talk to you.
translations: apc_انا حابب احكي معك.

unitsOfMeaning.content: بس حابب اورجيكم جمال الطبيعة في بلدنا
translations: en_But I want to show you the beauty of nature in our country.

unitsOfMeaning.content: But I want to show you the beauty of nature in our country.
translations: apc_بس حابب اورجيكم جمال الطبيعة في بلدنا

unitsOfMeaning.content: تفضل مرشد, عن شو حابب تحكيلنا؟

unitsOfMeaning.content: Go ahead, Murshid, what would you like to talk about?
translations: apc_تفضل مرشد, عن شو حابب تحكيلنا؟
en_I would like to join from San Diego.

unitsOfMeaning.content: I would like to join from San Diego.
translations: apc_حابب أنضم من سان دييغو.
en_I'm not really fond of these transparent curtains.

unitsOfMeaning.content: I'm not really fond of these transparent curtains.
translations: apc_‏ما لي حابب كتير هالبرادي الشفافة ‎
en_Yeah, I want to read something.

unitsOfMeaning.content: Yeah, I want to read something.
translations: apc_اه، حابب اقرأ إشي.

unitsOfMeaning.content: حابب اعيش بمحلّ هيك يكون محايد بمحلّ...
translations: en_I want to live in a place like this that is neutral in place...

unitsOfMeaning.content: I want to live in a place like this that is neutral in place...
translations: apc_حابب اعيش بمحلّ هيك يكون محايد بمحلّ...

unitsOfMeaning.content: Honestly, I really would like to live in Europe.

en_My brothers, I want to clarify a small issue for you.

unitsOfMeaning.content: My brothers, I want to clarify a small issue for you.
translations: apc_اخواني حابب اوضحكم شغله صغيره
en_I want to extract my tooth.

unitsOfMeaning.content: I want to extract my tooth.
translations: apc_أنا حابب أخلع سني.
en_I want to take that one.

unitsOfMeaning.content: I want to take that one.
translations: apc_أنا حابب آخد هاد.
en_I want to book an appointment with the doctor.

unitsOfMeaning.content: I want to book an appointment with the doctor.
translations: apc_حابب أحجز موعد عند الدكتور.

unitsOfMeaning.content: أنا حابب أورّيكم بسّ الكورونا في اسرائيل
translations: en_I just want to show you the coronavirus in Israel.

unitsOfMeaning.content: I just want to show you the coronavirus in Israel.
translations: apc_أنا حابب أورّيكم بسّ الكورونا في اسرائيل

unitsOfMeaning.content: انت حابب تشوف من إسرائيل حداثتها, تقدّمها,
translations: en_Do you want to see Israel's innovation and progress?

unitsOfMeaning.content: Do you want to see Israel's innovation and progress?
translations: apc_انت حابب تشوف من إسرائيل حداثتها, تقدّمها,

unitsOfMeaning.content: طالع بكير بكرا، لهيك حابب ادفع هلأ.
translations: en_I'm leaving early tomorrow, so I want to pay now.

unitsOfMeaning.content: I'm leaving early tomorrow, so I want to pay now.
translations: apc_طالع بكير بكرا، لهيك حابب ادفع هلأ.

unitsOfMeaning.content: شو نوع العصير اللي حابب تشربه؟
translations: en_What kind of juice do you like to drink?

unitsOfMeaning.content: What kind of juice do you like to drink?
translations: apc_شو نوع العصير اللي حابب تشربه؟

unitsOfMeaning.content: بالأول حابب أعمل لي مشية بالبلد ‎
translations: en_First of all, I feel like taking a walk in the city.

unitsOfMeaning.content: First of all, I feel like taking a walk in the city.
translations: apc_بالأول حابب أعمل لي مشية بالبلد ‎

unitsOfMeaning.content: أنا كتير آسف، بس حابب أجل الموعد.

unitsOfMeaning.content: I'm very sorry, but I'd like to postpone the meeting.

unitsOfMeaning.content: فكتير حابب إنّي أسافر ع اليابان.
translations: en_I really want to travel to Japan.

unitsOfMeaning.content: I really want to travel to Japan.

translations: en_I'd like to put this in a safe.

unitsOfMeaning.content: I'd like to put this in a safe.

unitsOfMeaning.content: على شو حابب تحكيلنا؟ - سلامات جلال.

translations: apc_على شو حابب تحكيلنا؟ - سلامات جلال.
en_I wanted to see what makes you so happy!

unitsOfMeaning.content: I want to put this in the safe.

unitsOfMeaning.content: Is there something you want to see?

unitsOfMeaning.content: لو سمحت، بس حابب أسلم تقرير السرقة.
translations: en_Excuse me, but I would like to submit the theft report.

unitsOfMeaning.content: Excuse me, but I would like to submit the theft report.
translations: apc_لو سمحت، بس حابب أسلم تقرير السرقة.

unitsOfMeaning.content: حابب أطلب شنتة لونها غامق لألي.

unitsOfMeaning.content: I would like to order a dark-colored bag for myself.

primaryUnitsOfMeaning.content: I want to take that one.

apc_‏اعمل معروف احكي بوضوح ‎

unitsOfMeaning.content: Who am I to say such a thing?

unitsOfMeaning.content: بدي احكي سياسة صرف ومن دون تجريح.

unitsOfMeaning.content: I want to talk purely about politics, without casting aspersions on anyone.

unitsOfMeaning.content: خاس احكي محنا نسوان زي بعض

translations: apc_خاس احكي محنا نسوان زي بعض
en_Call him and thank him.
apc_احكي احكي معه اشكره

unitsOfMeaning.content: – لا، ما معقولة! رغيد، احكي معها!
translations: en_– No, it doesn't make sense! Raghid, talk to her!

unitsOfMeaning.content: – No, it doesn't make sense! Raghid, talk to her!
translations: apc_– لا، ما معقولة! رغيد، احكي معها!

unitsOfMeaning.content: اطلع احكي لك كلمة خير لهالشّعب!

unitsOfMeaning.content: Get out and say a good word to the people!
translations: apc_اطلع احكي لك كلمة خير لهالشّعب!
en_Dasha, we are filming.. say yes

unitsOfMeaning.content: Dasha, we are filming.. say yes
translations: apc_داشا عم نصوّر.. احكي ايه
en_Can I talk to you?
apc_ممكن احكي معك = ممكن احاكيك ‎؟

unitsOfMeaning.content: فيها إشي كثير بيصدم خلينا احكي لكم
translations: en_There is something very shocking, let me tell you.

unitsOfMeaning.content: There is something very shocking, let me tell you.
translations: apc_فيها إشي كثير بيصدم خلينا احكي لكم
en_Speak Arabic with me, in front of me.

unitsOfMeaning.content: Speak Arabic with me, in front of me.
translations: apc_احكي معي عربي قدّامي

unitsOfMeaning.content: احكي وين الدّهبات ولا تشاهدي على روحك،
translations: en_Tell me where the gold is or recite the Shahada before you die,

unitsOfMeaning.content: Tell me where the gold is or recite the Shahada before you die,
translations: apc_احكي وين الدّهبات ولا تشاهدي على روحك،

unitsOfMeaning.content: منشان الله، اطلع، احكي لك أيّ كلمة
translations: en_For God's sake, come out, say something.

unitsOfMeaning.content: For God's sake, come out, say something.
translations: apc_منشان الله، اطلع، احكي لك أيّ كلمة

unitsOfMeaning.content: احكي لنا ليلى وشو صار معهم
translations: en_Tell us, Leila, what happened with them.

unitsOfMeaning.content: Tell us, Leila, what happened with them.
translations: apc_احكي لنا ليلى وشو صار معهم

unitsOfMeaning.content: احكي لي شي عن إيام صباك ‎
translations: en_Tell me something about your youth.

unitsOfMeaning.content: Tell me something about your youth.
translations: apc_احكي لي شي عن إيام صباك ‎

unitsOfMeaning.content: And why shouldn't I tell him?
translations: apc_وليش ما احكي له

apc_‏اعمل معروف احكي بصوت مفهوم أكتر ‎
en_Call this friend.
apc_احكي تليفون مع هذا الصديق

unitsOfMeaning.content: – ايش كتبت لها شعر، احكي لنا!
translations: en_– What poem did you write for her? Tell us!

unitsOfMeaning.content: – What poem did you write for her? Tell us!
translations: apc_– ايش كتبت لها شعر، احكي لنا!

unitsOfMeaning.content: اول حياة بنتي كنت احكي معها عربي

unitsOfMeaning.content: At the beginning of my daughter's life, I spoke to her in Arabic.
translations: apc_اول حياة بنتي كنت احكي معها عربي

unitsOfMeaning.content: Tell us about your artistic activity.

unitsOfMeaning.content: I want to make a call to Japan.
translations: apc_بدي احكي مكالمة عاليابان.

apc_احكي كمان مرة لو سمحت.

unitsOfMeaning.content: اخر شيء ممكن احكي عنه انه
translations: en_The last thing I can tell you about is

unitsOfMeaning.content: The last thing I can tell you about is

unitsOfMeaning.content: وصرت احكي معها عبري بنفس الوقت

unitsOfMeaning.content: And I started speaking to her in Hebrew at the same time.
translations: apc_وصرت احكي معها عبري بنفس الوقت

unitsOfMeaning.content: Can I speak with the manager?
translations: apc_فيني احكي مع المدير؟
en_Talk to people.
apc_احكي مع ناس
en_Let me tell you
apc_خليني احكي لكم
